attributes.action: Publically accept that human activity is not responsible for the current natural global warming phase
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current global warming phase has entirely natural causes and is well within the normal range of historical global temperatures.
No scientist has yet proven the theories that either Man's activities or CO2 have ever driven global temperatures.
The current 'witch hunts' against all human progress and development is damaging to the developed world and inhuman to the developing world.
The UK Government should adopt the lead by showing that it is unwilling to accept the false and untested science.
Encouraging a clean environment along with the protection of the earth’s assets are worthy in their own right. They do not need the protection of the false science of the Global Warming proponents.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/climateimpact/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
